data: “No, siree, sir,” Abe Potash exclaimed as he drew a check to the order of his attorney for a hundred and fifty dollars, "I would positively go it alone from now on till I die, Noblestone.
Potash & Perlmutter: Their Copartnership Ventures and Adventures
